ISSUE.TITLE: Activity Types data table - Invalid JSON response when refresh grid
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.30 beta Steps to reproduce the problem: 1) Go /Admin/ActivityLog/ActivityTypes 2) scroll down and refresh table You will get this error **DataTables warning: table id=activityLogType-grid - Invalid JSON response. For more information about this error, please see http://datatables.net/tn/1**

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #4548 Fixed refresh grid with clien side data source
